page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: The houses in Aberaeron were built in the early{19th century}when the town developed around the harbour.The town is expanding so older houses and shops are at the the centre and newer houses are further out e.g. on Lampeter Rd, Rhiw Goch etc. The vicarage was built in 1863 and has been recently modernized.{Sir Geraint {Evans,the famous opera singer}lives in Aberaeron in the house built in 1845 by John Harris, a local shipbuilder, and the house is now called{Trelawney. The older houses are prettier than the modern ones and sell better (this was confirmed by the estate agent). Aberaeron is a holiday town and attractive houses are expensive. The typical house is a square layout, emphatic quoins and keystones. The surface is brightly coloured plaster, large windows,and pillared porches.
